LanguageData.JRWScutosaurus.label: Scutosaurus
LanguageData.JRWScutosaurus.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #03812-1922 [SCUTOSAURUS KARPINSKII] CODENAME: SHIELD >082
A peculiar pareiasaur with elongated spikes growing down from their chin. They are bulky, quite lumberous, and are dimwitted, but quite charming, in an odd way.
LanguageData.JRWScutosaurus.tools.head.label: head
